Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/6/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $480,000 per year...
Injured on 6/12/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Atlanta to Texas on 6/2/1991 (Going to ATL: CF Sammy Sosa. Going to TEX: P Andy Ashby, P Ben McDonald, 3B Jeff Blauser, CF Al Martin)...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1993...
